articles.content:
U.S. hostile policy toward DPRK denounced
    Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Workers, the Democratic Youth Union and the Dar Al Talia Publishing House in Lebanon released a joint statement on Dec. 16, denouncing the united states for its moves to stifle the DPRK.
 Recalling that the U.S. singled out people's Korea as part of an "axis of evil" and threatened to make a preemptive nuclear attack on it, the statement said that any attempt of a un member country, fancying itself as a great power, to crush other member country by arms should be eradicated.    
 All the UN member countries should respect each other with equal rights and make joint efforts to promote peace and security among them, it stressed.

articles.content:
Floral basket and congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The diplomatic corps here presented a floral basket and a congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 92 (2003).
 The floral basket and the letter were conveyed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today by Palestinian Ambassador to Korea Shaher Mohammed Abdlah who is doyen of the corps.
